lines.text: Chicago PD thinks you're a cop-killer, you know what that means?
I'm off the departments Christmas list?
Ohh great, more cops.
We are with the FBI, this is agent Wesley and I am agent Stewart.
Ohh cops in suits.
Don't fear the weapon, fear the man.
Think positive. Some guy's got you by the balls? Think positive, cut off his hands.

[after telling an FBI agent that they know he's in cohoots with the mob]
They man wants to be arrested. I say arrest him.
Jake, why don't you take those fists of fury of yours outside, you're making the poor man nervous.

[smugly]
Good.

[pointing to himself]
THIS poor man.

[to his lovely assistant]
Go buy yourself a bag of doughnuts.

[reviewing his father's military file]
How'd you get this?
Through a friend at Interpol. I called in a favour.
Well, you better call them back. I don't think you got all of it.
What were you hoping to find in there?
I don't know. Nothing.
[shoves it angrily off the table]
You're welcome. You know, this wasn't an easy thing to get.
So why'd you do it then?
Excuse me?
I mean, everybody wants something, especially a 24 hour a day cop.
You're really asking me why I did this?
I just keep wondering when Lieutenant Ryan and his wish list are gonna come through the door.
You asshole! I read the file, Jake. Your father was doing what he thought was right and he died. It happens every day. Deal with it.
I want you to know, Jake, that I'm the only one who did this to myself, and to you. I want you to know that I take responsibility for my personal actions.
This isn't EST, Frank.

[looks in cupboard]
Pop-tarts.
[looks in fridge]
More Pop-Tarts.

[looking at a sketch that Jake has drawn of her with a large dragon behind her]
Wow... is that me...?
No, you're the dragon.
You wanna go out with me?
Sure.
[jotts down the address for him]
Who knows... maybe you'll think I'm sexier with my clothes on!

[to himself, after grinning and holding the door open for her to leave]
Don't bet on it...
Whatever it takes? Whatever it takes is something that happens to somebody else.
Can I look at what you did?
Sure.

[after looking at his drawing of her and a dragon]
Wow. Is that me?
No, you're the dragon.
Knock yourself out.
